summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Blackjack Trainer with proxy configuration. All test cases passed successfully including user authentication, table redirect, HUD stats tracking, card dealing, card counting (Running Count/True Count), game actions (Hit/Stand), and result verification.
passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint responding correctly
User registration API (user3@test.com / password123)
User login API with JWT token generation
Get current user endpoint (/api/me) returning user data with bankroll $10,000
Update settings endpoint working correctly
Save session endpoint persisting game data
Frontend login with user3@test.com / password123
Redirect to Table page after successful login
HUD panel displaying initial stats (Running Count: 0, True Count: 0.0, Decks Left: 6.0)
Deal ($10) button functionality
Cards dealt and displayed for both Dealer and Player
HUD stats updated after deal (Running Count: 2, True Count: 0.3)
Card counting system working correctly (Hi-Lo method)
Hit button functionality during player turn
Stand button functionality to end player turn
Game result message displayed ('You win!')
Bankroll tracking and update (changed from $10,000 to $9,960)
Strategy advice displayed in HUD
Proxy configuration working correctly (package.json proxy to localhost:8001)
REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL cleared as requested, using proxy instead
